title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1500.4 - Sounding devices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1500.4 - Sounding devices

State Regulations
(a) New sounding
devices within a hotel or similar dwelling shall be of the same type and shall
sound a clear audible signal that is distinct from all signals by other
sounding devices used in the vicinity. (b) New sounding devices shall be located
approximately eight feet above floor level wherever practicable. (c) New fire alarm systems shall have no more
than 14 sounding devices connected on a single direct current circuit, nor more
than 10 sounding devices connected on a single alternating current
circuit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1500.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
